Buffalo.Grace Evangelical Lutheran Church (Buffa:
Grace Lutheran Church or Grace Evangelical Lutheran Church as it is now known, is located at 174 Cazenovia St, Buffalo, New York in the city's South Buffalo neighborhood.


== History ==
Grace English Evangelical Lutheran Church of Buffalo was organized March 17, 1904 and held its first service in Kingston Hall on Palm Sunday, March 27, 1904. Grace Evangelical Lutheran Church, was incorporated in 1905, and established in a building on Kingston and Seneca streets.
